Scripts.OnLoad:
this:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); BCEPGP_guild_log_restore_desc:SetText("Enter the name of the record
you want to restore
|c00FF0000Make sure this is what you want to do.
This will overwrite ALL current guild EPGP
standings with the record.");

this:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton"); BCEPGP_settings_import_desc:SetText("Enter the name of the player
you would like to import settings from.
This will overwrite all of your existing settings.

Player must be in your guild or raid group");

FontString.name: BCEPGP_traffic_desc
FontString.text: A record of the EPGP traffic in your guild
